Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property features large windows allowing ample natural light, an exterior court and is located minutes away from a number of amenities & services such a hotels, restaurants, financial institutions and provincial and municipal services. SIZE: 6,000 sq. ft. ground level 2,180 sq. ft. mezzanine level - NET RENT: $12 PSF - PARKING ON SITE: 662 spaces - ADDITIONAL RENT:CAM $2.56 per square foot per annum TAXES $6.73 per square foot per annum - CO-TENANTS: Sobeys, NBLC and Shoppers Drug Mart

Located at the new Junction Urban Village in downtown Moncton near the Avenir Centre, Tannery Place is a new mixed-use property that will provide its residents an active and chic urban lifetyle close to all key services, while offering its retail and commercial tenants a strategic location with strong exposure and visibility.
Various suites available from 800 sq. ft. to 13,372 sq. ft. on the ground flower of the south tower, and future leasing opportunities in the north tower. See the flyer for more details!

The retail/ wholesale facility at 55 Trinity Drive in Wheeler Park Power Center is a truly unique opportunity to acquire a sizeable asset that provides flexible options to maximize the end-user potential. Purpose-built in 1995 for the operation of a Kent Building Supplies store, the 95,640 square-foot steel frame building offers a 40‚Äô column width and a 250‚Äô depth. This allows owner-occupiers endless possibilities to integrate operations within the facility and it also provides investors the ability to subdividethe building into desirable, mid-sized boxes ‚Äì all within a dominant retail node in Moncton‚Äôs north end.

Where Gorge Road and Mountain Road intersect comes a new dynamic commercial node. Gorge Road Plaza by Cordova Realty creates a new transit-friendly, mix-used development with diverse retail, convenient services and office space. See the flyer for more!
